com.revature.services

Class UserService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.revature.services.UserService

  • public class UserService
extends java.lang.Object
    Models all services and operations that might apply to AppUsers.

        public java.util.List<AppUser> getAllUser()

        Throws:
        ResourceNotFoundException

      • authenticate

        public AppUser authenticate(Credentials credentials)
                     throws AuthenticationException
        This method authenticates a AppUser that already exists within the database. with the given credentials with the database. If a user already exists with the credentials or a user does not exist with the credentials or any credential is either null or empty, then the method will not authenticate.
        Parameters:
        credentials - the Credentials to authenticate.
        Throws:
        AuthenticationException

      • register

        public void register(AppUser newUser)
        This method registers a new AppUser into the database.
        Parameters:
        newUser - the AppUser to store/register in the database.

      • updateUser

        public boolean updateUser(AppUser user)
        This method updates the records of a AppUser that exists on the database with the local record.
        Parameters:
        user - the AppUser to update.
        Returns:
        returns true if the update was successful, false otherwise.

      • deleteUserById

        public boolean deleteUserById(int id)
        This method deletes a AppUser with the given id from the the database, along with any records only pertinent to them.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the AppUser.
        Returns:
        returns true if the deletion was successful, false if otherwise. If there was no such user, returns true.

      • deleteUserByUsername

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • isUserValid

        public boolean isUserValid(AppUser user)
        Validates that the given AppUser and its fields are valid (not null or empty strings). Does not perform validation on id or Role fields.
        Parameters:
        user - the AppUser to validate.
        Returns:
        true if the AppUser is valid.

      • activateUserById

        public boolean activateUserById(int id)
        Sets the AppUser.isActive() to true for a user with the given id.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the AppUser to activate.
        Returns:
        true if the activation was successful.
